name: Fallcone
description: Simply just TAP and change the direction, but think ahead about acceleration.

name: Firefly Sky
description:
To Catch the fireflies you tap your screen to throw the jar in the air. The longer you hold the tap the higher the jar will go. Tilt your device left or right to move the little girl. The jar will move with the girl even while in the air.
Your aim is you catch the yellow fireflies on each level. Each new level will have more and more fireflies.
Be careful of the red ones. They fly slower but they'll make you lose a heart. If you lose all your hearts the game is over. Now and then a very fast pink bug will appear. If you catch it you'll get a bonus life!

name: Flip Pigs
description: Explosively fun, colorful pigs, this game tests your ability to ‘find’ and ‘match’ pigs in 2,3,4,5 in a row. Flip pigs in a fundamentally re-imagined match 3 game.

name: Free the Fobbles! For Two
description: Sin descripción

name: Go Zero
description:
Get ready for a fun, new challenge!
Slide numbers to make zero and score!
Complete 8 beautiful islands with unique challenges!

name: Invert pixels
description:
Invert pixels have a minimalistic pixel graphics because gameplay is most valueable.
Some of the puzzles will have more difficulty but you can try as many times as you like!
If you like interesting block game try this one because it have all the charm of the puzzle game: simple, fun, attractive and suitable to everybody. Remember this is very simple and addictive gameplay.

name: Jumbo Airport Story
description:
Make your fledgling airport into a world-famous international landmark jam-packed with entertainment!
First build facilities such as Bistros and Bookstores to make visitors comfortable.
Satisfied customers make your airport more popular, and will attract even more visitors!
But the bigger your airport gets, the more tired visitors will be from walking around...
Still, never fear! Simply place seating like Benches and Sofas near facilities, and visitors will be able to rest up.

name: Osu! Stream
description: Osu! Stream is a rhythm game made for touch-enabled devices, with 45 playable songs and new gameplay elements.

name: Brain Switch Out
description:
Brain switch out is the ideal memory trainer game for everybody who loves to play addictive brain challenging games. On the off chance that you appreciate playing memory match games then you will love this new free endless game!
The main objective of this addictive endless game is to watch the emplacement of some cubes and try to find them correctly after we hide them. But, keep in mind that you should remember the correct place of each cube as you can find them easily or you will lose. Remember also that there is no timer, so you can take as much time as you want to find the cubes and go to the following level.

name: ChengDu Mahjong
description:
This game is based on the rules of XueZhan mahjong of Chengdu, China, which been proposed by Chengdu local developer.
All the special rules of Xuezhang mahjong are supported, such as XueZhan (players who still not win can continue play the game until only left one player or haven't tiles), added glory to a gong, robbing a gong, must lack suit, self drawn award, etc.

name: CrimeStory: In the restaurant
description: All the restaurants we go to. Quiet music, friendly atmosphere, delicious food. But the inner life of the restaurant is hidden from prying eyes. What's going on in the kitchen? Whether employees are satisfied with the chief? Robbed chief. Who is the culprit? Read it.

name: Crossy Animals Road
description:
Tasty Candy that will leave you hungry for more and hours of fun!
How FAR can the deer go? Why did the DEER cross the road? Discover how many roads and logs can the deer, frog and more animal characters can cross!
Don't let the cars and trains hit you!

name: CubicTourPlus.
description: With simple rules, a cool look, and players all over the world, Cubic Tour has now been updated extensively with new features!

name: 50 Rooms: Mystery World Escape
description: Join me in these fantasy escape games and take an exciting adventure into the world of magical stories to an unforgettable journey to solve its mysteries.

name: A Detective's Demise
description: A Detective’s Demise is a dark, tech-noir inspired 3D audio adventure experience. Take on the role of the “Detective,” a Lambton enforcer with a few tales to tell; as you delve deep in the grime and mystery of a future District 5. Traverse the mean streets of Dusklight’s most brutal district as you search for “her,” encountering all manner of creatures, the lowest of the low, emboldened with heightened technology at your side. Pitch Black: A Detective’s Demise.

name: Ascender
description:
Ascend from the depths of the abyss in this original 8-BIT style arcade game.
Navigate through challenging terrain and defeat enemies while trying not to overheat your engine.
This simple arcade game will have your heart pumping as you approach the next checkpoint.

name: Between Portals
description:
Between Portals is an exploration through the intricacies of the universe. Go on a mission to increase humanity's understanding of foreign star systems and discover new stars. As new star systems can be tricky to navigate, you need to alter the flight path of the space capsule to spend as much time exploring as possible. Portals in each star system have a strong gravitational pull, forcing the capsule to take the shortest route on its own.
Find 270 stars in 90 different star systems on your journey through three galaxies. Use cosmic dust clouds and wormholes to your advantage. Expect to be puzzled and challenged when navigating space labyrinths with hours of good fun and even longer to unlock all 270 stars.

name: Beyond the Wall
description: You ring your friend's doorbell, but still, no one opens, although the light is on? Discover what happens one summer’s night Beyond the Wall of the garden with the tall house. Immerse yourself into a mysterious world where fantasy meets reality with a pinch of humor. Beyond the Wall is a classic point-and-click adventure with a magical atmosphere and captivating music. Solve puzzles, collect items, and overcome obstacles that await you on your journey in ten unique levels Beyond the Wall. Developed by Rocking Toy.

name: Air Hockey Black
description: Arcade style Air Hockey with 8 tables to choose from, each with varying levels of difficulty!

name: Alpaca Farm!
description:
Get ready to build the most exciting alpaca empire! Take care of amazing alpacas. Build and expand your farm. Beat the competition in exciting trade shows.
You will build an alpaca paradise, with stables, shearing rooms, spa, fitness room, … All your amazing animals generate lots of wool, that you craft into fashionable wares for the market. Hire sales managers to sell your wares on the market and earn money to expand in your farm.

name: Alter Dogma
description:
This RPG features a 2D dungeon that lets you explore the world and find clues regarding the Tree of Life 'Sacred Tree' by managing the Knights hired by the Order.
Decide on the Knights that you want and lead them by embarking on a journey into an unknown world!
Nurture your Knights with strength, intelligence, vitality, dexterity, agility and luck - six abilities you can distribute strategically to enjoy an extensive type of combat by using nine types of knights and specific operating skills.
Using ten different unique character-related skills and common abilities can be useful in combat.

name: Animal Cars Kids Racing Game
description:
Animal Cars Kids Racing Game is a fun and exciting racing game for young kids and toddlers. With 16 different Animal Cars to choose from, like the cat, dog, lion, penguin, elephant and much more, your child takes control of the animal car with simple controls so it’s easy for them to pick up and play.
18 different worlds to race in, Collect and eat fruit along the way to unlock more animal cars with the prize claw! If your kids love animals and cars, then this game is for them.

name: Infineural
description:
Infineural is a short horror game that doesn't rely on jumpscares or monsters to shock the player, but instead on the concept of time dilation. This game features multiple endings.

Remember: 1 minute on Earth is 10 years in the warp-drive, so make sure you drink that coffee. It makes you forget.

name: American Commando
description:
Gear up for an explosive journey into the heart of a twisted war! American Commando combines the razor-sharp wit of Duke Nukem, the mind-bending aesthetics of Wolfenstein, and adrenaline-pumping blitzkrieg-style gameplay. Brace yourself, soldier, and rewrite the course of history!

Get ready to immerse yourself in a nostalgia-fueled, 90s-style FPS adventure that will leave you grinning from ear to ear. Embrace the pixelated charm we all adore and prepare to unleash havoc on hordes of Nazi soldiers. Armed with a formidable arsenal of traditional WWII weapons and mind-bending Wunderwaffe prototypes, obliterate your enemies in style!

description: Dawnlands is an Open-World Survival Crafting cross-platform game with a massive world and epic lore. A variety of biomes, relics, and puzzles dot the landscape... an ancient land, lain dormant for centuries, is waiting to be awoken. New stories are waiting to be written.

name: After the Flood
description: Five local teenagers have gone missing from Prairieville, Louisiana. The town is in an uproar. In this first-person survival horror game, play as Detective May Samson, sent to help find these missing kids. Investigate to piece together the story and learn the dark truth behind this simple town.

name: Neural Cloud
description:
"Warning! Fatal Error: System integrity severely compromised..."
This is an unprecedented threat to the existence of Dolls. In face of formidable enemies and a future filled with uncertainties, the scattered Dolls grit their teeth and steel themselves as they travel in search of the slim hope of salvation.
Humankind may have abandoned them, but as the person in charge of "Project Neural Cloud", you have steadfastly set foot in this unknown land and founded the "Exiles" as you take in meandering Dolls. With you as their leader, the Exiles shall explore the secrets of the world, find a way out of this desperate situation, and uncover the truth...

Neural Cloud is a strategy RPG with a cyber theme. Upload yourself to save the world!

name: Against All Odds
description: Against All Odds is an immersive story based top-down shooter, where you follow the tragic story of Maxwell Philben. Fight your way out, tearing anything that comes in your way and find out the madness behind your abduction.

name: Agenda 21
description: Set amongst the ruins of Joe Biden's America, survival means war. Fight alone or with friends and AI in this brutal third person action game. Everyone from criminal gangs and corrupt cops is out to get you on the streets of Freeside. Do you have what it takes to survive?

description: A Halloween Valentine is a puzzle-adventure pop album set in a haunted amusement park on Valentine's Day.

description: AI: Art Impostor is the brand new party AI drawing game. You are an artist who commands AI to draw new artwork. You and other artists will collaborate in preparing for the next exhibition, but one of you doesn't know its theme. You should find a fake artist without being doubted by other artists.

name: Air Defenders
description: A small and interesting air defense simulator. Don't let enemy missiles reach their target!

name: Piano Star
description: Tap the black tiles! You can easily perform a piano music by yourself. With fun and ease, melody and rhythm of piano songs will flow freely by your fingers.

name: Alchemist: The Potion Monger
description: Become the Alchemist not only in your Lab! Open the door of your home, explore, gather ingredients, interact with various characters and sell or use the potions you craft! Design your home and grow plants in the backyard. Be good, bad, or neutral, and write your own alchemical tale!

name: Monster Monster
description: Sin descripción

name: Alice with Gatling
description: This is an exhilarating FPS where you shoot your Gatling Gun and mow down your enemies! Face a horde of monsters as a cute girl "Alice".

name: Sword of Glory Roguelite Slash
description: Sin descripción

name: Alien Invasion
description: Join the battle to save earth from aliens and robots. Choose to play on the side of humans or aliens in battle. 1. Play alongside up to 100 online players 2. Choose various levels 3. Play in various modes such a s capture the king, rush, team deathmatch, conquest.

name: AlphaBlue
description: Cross the universe, shoot aliens, upgrade your weapons and face powerful bosses with AB in this retro inspired lateral shoot 'em up to save the world. Adventure into Campaign Mode or face the never-ending waves of Endless Mode with suitable challenges for all skill levels.

name: Ceplion
description: Unique platforming mechanics with detailed enemy patterns and combat skills. Explore the Ceplion Island and Uncover the dark truth about its people.

name: Chacara
description: Hitting the highway immediately after finishing a crazy party was definitely not a good idea... Now you are stranded on the road, luckily, there is a cozy country house nearby, what could go wrong?

name: ChamberLocked
description: After you were stunned you found yourself in an abandoned house. You got out of bed and tried to leave the room only to find that the door was locked. However, you heard the door outside the room open...

name: ChaseTag
description: Come participate at ChaseTag ! A tag competition where athletes are candy ! Face your friends in intense Player-versus-Player matches, that will make you sweat !

name: Chevalier Historie: Append
description: Follow Jeanne, the first and only female knight in the Kingdom of Berde's lengthy history. She sets out to restore the Royal Ring's power and save the imprisoned Princess Lily. The new Append adds another adventure for Jeanne and her friends, along with many new scenes and events!

name: Chicken Hero in Wulin
description: All Creatures will be uphold justice and "chivalrous".In the familiar world of martial arts,I regenerate a chicken.As a chicken, can you change your life against the weather and create miracles!Become an unprecedented and fantastic Great Xia! Everything is about to start!

name: Child of Aether
description: A 3rd person, quest based, survival horror journey, with a heavy lean on narrative, mystery, exploration and detective work. Uncover the circumstances behind the grim world you awaken in, and in the process learn the truth by piecing together the many character stories clues and puzzles

name: Choice of the Viking
description: Sail forth to a land of gods and giants! Wield your sword, words, and magic to take your place among Iceland’s chieftains and forge your legacy of honor.

name: Cities: Skylines - Paradise Radio
description: Let the synth sounds surround you on your journey towards endless adventure. This radio station will have you building to 80’s-inspired synth tracks that let your imagination flow freely.

name: Cities: Skylines - Shoreline Radio
description: Play Shoreline Radio and portal yourself to a much slower natural pace. Peace out, transmute your ego into pure self-love and let your heartbeat to a new-age folkish indie vibe.

name: City Massacre
description: Zombie first-person shooter with elements of survival

name: Darold the Doomer: Back 2 Reality
description: The sequel that takes place in the real world.

name: Datasight
description: will take you behind enemy lines as a member of an elite special forces unit engaging in covert warfare, classified operations, and explosive conflicts across the globe. Your actions will tip the balance during the most dangerous time period mankind has ever known.

name: Super Mario Death Row!
description:
Wowza! Nintendo's gone and done something new and exciting for Mario's 35th Anniversary; a playable Nintendo Direct!

That's right! Live out the live execution of everyone's favorite Italian Plumber, all from the comfort of your own home! Browse the gallery of his greatest hits, talk to all of his friends and family, and make Mario face his death with dignity! All in celebration of the world's most famous Goomba-stompin', mushroom-chompin' hero!

name: Dawn of Arba
description: Become a new adventurer in a massive online multiplayer adventure. Explore the new Dawn emerging over the horizon of a new world, ARBA. Although beautiful at first sight, ARBA's history harbors a hidden secret and a much deeper and dangerous truth.

name: Dawn of Kagura: Maika's Story - The Dragon's Wrath
description: Vanquish and recruit youkai in randomized dungeons in Dawn of Kagura: Maika's Story, a replayable roguelike RPG! To save the villagers, Maika decides to take up her pike and go into battle once more...

name: Deadly Desert
description: Deadly desert is a survival story of two men, a young boy and his disabled father. It all started with an unfortunate accident in the middle of Nevada desert. Unfortunately, their car broke down on the way. They were waiting a long time for any help and then decided to take life in their own hands.

name: Death Relives
description: Be prepared for a first-person look on life through the eyes of a teenager, who is trying to escape from mighty Aztec god Xipe Totec. Get ready for a chaotic experience with horror and survival mechanics.

name: Deceptus
description: Arena PVP Multiplayer with up to 8 Players, pure mayhem, kill and collect famous death coins to unlock and equip up your characters with famous accessories and power-ups on 9 levels and counting.

name: Decopins: Asset Fighters Series
description: Decopins (meaning flick in japanese) is a tower defense like game with simple click. Don't let Donuts escape from your donuts shop by Clicking! 20 stages, Hell/Death mode, and more. Level up your Decopin and make full use of your MAGIC.

name: Epic Ninja
description: Epic Ninja - Bad Dudes have taken over the Town, Use Your Stealth and Combat Skills to take out the Bad Dudes and Save the Town. Battle Enemies across Several Exciting Levels !

name: Epsylon
description: A private eye mystery game where you decide how to solve the case. Use your detective skills to solve the case or rely on the abilities of your little dragon partner to see things from a new angle.

name: Eureka
description: Eureka is an open-world business management simulator. From gold mining to wheat farming, choose your products, manage your resources, and grow your business however you see fit!

name: Europe Bus Driver
description: Europe Bus Driver presents a passenger transport simulator through the largest European capitals.

name: Europe Empire 2027
description: Lead your European empire in an empire building turn based strategy war game. Are you ready to lead, Supreme Commander?

name: Evil Fate
description: Evil Fate is a first person psychological horror game. A lone cabin in the middle of the nowhere, those two aren't simple. Captured and imprisoned under a structure, he will have to escape.

name: Executor
description: This game is Psy-fi fiction! Its first person/third person shooter with massive gun battles of robots and you. Robots take power and start full-scale military activity by fixing each others and build new ones but we cant tolerate this any more... Stay sharp.

name: Expense
description: Balance chance and strategy to escape a procedurally generated maze of unique AI opponents in this first-person adventure/escape room blend. Follow your pendulum and try not to lose money; you're going to need it.

name: Extraction Force
description: Nuclear launch codes have been stolen! Invade the enemy base. Destroy everything in your path. Locate the stolen codes and return them safely to prevent the end of the world.

name: Eyo: Jump 'n' Run RPG
description: Upgrade your robot, equip powerful weapons and defences and uncover the secret of your existence. Merciless enemies, treacherous traps and tricky jump 'n' run passages await you in this Jump 'n' Run RPG adventure by two passionate indie game developers.

name: Freedom Drive
description: Drive for your life, and Freedom. Defeat your challengers, upgrade your vehicle or purchase new more powerful vehicles with your winnings. Race the clock to beat your best time and earn more rewards.

name: Freed Software
description: Freesoft is an IT company simulator. You have to build your own IT empire. Develop your character and your employees. Create the best software in the game world.

name: Freerunners
description: Become a freerunner. Find a flow and underlying rhythm of movement through your environment. Vault, climb, jump, duck, swing, flip, slide, do what it takes to travel as fast as possible whilst using your environment to outwit the enemy henchmen and save your friend.

name: Frenzy
description: In this simple riff on an arcade classic, released in 1983 for the ZX Spectrum by famed game developer/publisher Ocean Software, search labarinthine levels for the exit, while surviving an ever-increasing onslaught of deadly robots.

name: Half Hour Hexagon
description: Obliterate a never-ending horde of enemies while you attempt to reach the 30 minute mark. Race to earn XP and level up to gain new items and opportunities for each run to become stronger than the last.

name: InfiniPicross 2.0: Halloween
description: More than a hundred Medium and Large Halloween picross puzzles for the Infinipicross 2.0 game! (Like, 102!)

name: Halloween Trouble 4
description: Halloween Trouble 4 is a Match 3 game with a cheery yet spooky halloween ambience. The game tells the story of a detective who receives a mysterious invitation to the witch forest. The game also includes minigames for variety and extra fun!

name: Hallway Defender
description: Hallway Defender is a roguelite tower defense where you defend your base from an endless wave of fellow classmates. With over 25 different towers and even more upgrades and effects there are infinite ways to set up your own defenses.

name: Hand Simulator: Rendezvous
description: Hand Simulator: Rendezvous is game for adult fans of the series. Create appointments. Play with friends tete-a-tete or a big group. Chat or do something hot.

name: Handyman Legend
description: The dude was a playboy when he was young, while after losing his job in big company, he become a handyman who take cases from smartphone app. Even though the money is short, but he somehow discovers a new paradise...

name: HardCube 2
description: HardCube 2 is an adventure puzzle game. You play as a cute creature that travels through colorful worlds. Each level has its own history, secrets and dangers!

name: Hero Jumper
description: Hero Jumper is sandbox game where you can destroy objects and do whatever you want.

name: Hidden Desire
description: Hidden Desire is a sexual adventure that encourages lewd lust. Take on the role of a director of erotic films on your way to worldwide fame and provide your companions with a place in the sun.

name: Hidden Office Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Hidden Shapes: Cat Realm
description: The hero kitty sets out on an epic quest to save the princess from a dragon's clutches! Relax and have fun following the story and solving beautiful hand-drawn puzzles in a world of adventurous kittens. A beautiful puzzle created to delight you and rescue your tranquility.

name: Inversion Institute
description: A visual novel/puzzle game set in a medieval fantasy world. Using "Magic Ink," you will draw working logical gizmos and contraptions to solve problems for the Institute and surrounding townsfolk. With the help of other characters, you may even invent a machine that will change the world forever.

name: Isekai Janken Hero
description: The player plays an unemployed man who travels to the other world, where the goddess grants him magical powers and embarks on a journey to save the world... But there seems to be some secret behind this?

name: Is It Wrong to Repay the Debt in a Dungeon?
description: To repay the debt, both Akane and her mother have to earn a lot of money! Explore the dungeon, challenge strong enemies, and even use her own body! Everything she is trying to do is for saving her family!!

name: I told you
description: A tactical action adventure in which you will have to use stealth and the few resources at your hand to face the forces of a regime that took away the only thing you had left.

name: Super Mario Death Row 2: Shroomshank Redemption
description: Wuh-oh! Looks like Mario's gotten himself in a bit of a pinch! He appears to be safe and sound in the sewers of the Mushroom Kingdom...but how? A mysterious savior seems to have taken pity to Mario's sorry ROM-downloading soul.

name: I Wanna Go Home
description: Can't stand working overtime anymore! Must find some properties to get rid of this ugly office,be aware of the mean boss,don't get caught by him!

name: Jasper's Dream
description: Jasper's Dream is a first person puzzle game set in a techno mystic Egyptian world. Help Jasper, a robot programmed to create games, by solving his mind-bending puzzles. You will also explore an abandonned futuristic pyramid and unravel its many mysteries.

name: Jeeps Offroad Simulator
description: Have you ever had the opportunity to participate in a real offroad?

name: Avatar: The Last Airbender Book 1 Challenges
description: Avatar: The Last Airbender Book 1 Challenges was a Plug It In & Play TV Game system developed by HotGen Ltd. and published by Jakks Pacific in 2006.

name: Atari
description: The Atari Joystick Controller TV Video Game System was made in 2003 in Jakks Pacific's Plug It In & Play TV Games plug-n-play game system lineup. The device itself is designed to look like the joystick used on the Atari 2600.

name: 1 vs. 100
description: 1 vs. 100 is a Plug It In & Play TV Game based off the game show of the same name developed by Pronto Games released by Jakks Pacific in 2006.

name: Activision
description:
The Activision 10-in-1 is a TV Games Video Game System released in 2000 (with copyright year of 2001) by Toymax. This is not only one of the oldest plug-and-play systems, but also the first plug-n-play to be licensed. When Jakks Pacific bought out Toymax, they later reintroduced it in 2004 with a new controller design.

Built-in games:

Pitfall!
Atlantis
River Raid
Spider Fighter
Crackpots
Freeway
Tennis
Boxing
Ice Hockey
Grand Prix

name: Are You Smarter Than A 5th Grader?
description: The Are You Smarter Than A 5th Grader? Plug-and-Play game is is based off the game show of the same name. It was released in 2006 by Jakks Pacific.

name: Atari
description:
Plug It In & Play TV Games: Atari was released in 2004 by Jakks Pacific in both one and two player versions. The paddle controller contains 13 classic Atari games:

Super Breakout
Casino
Warlords
Arcade Warlords
Circus Atari
Street Racer
Demons To Diamonds
Steeple Chase
Night Driver
Breakout
Canyon Bomber
Video Olympics
Pong

name: Bejeweled Deluxe
description: Bejeweled Deluxe is a plug-n-play TV game controller released by Jakks Pacific in 2008. It is a port of PopCap Games' Bejeweled Deluxe, featuring graphics and sound based on Bejeweled 2.

name: Big Buck Hunter Pro
description:
Big Buck Hunter Pro is a deluxe hunting TV game based off the arcade game of the same name by Play Mechanix. Released in 2009 by Jakks Pacific and delovped by SuperHappyFunFun. A two player version was also released with the controllers green and orange.

In 2011, The TV game was discontinued afterwards and a sequel was released called Big Buck Safari.

In 2012 it was sold again only from April 2th to December 24th.

The game is just a Big Buck Hunter Pro arcade port where you just shoot down bucks and not the does. You play either 1 trek or 3 treks hunting adventure. There's also minigames you play at the end of your hunting adventure.

name: Big Buck Safari
description: Big Buck Safari is Plug It In & Play TV Hunting video game based off the Play Mechenix arcade game released by Jakks Pacific in 2011 two years after the Big Buck Hunter Pro TV game.

name: Blue's Room: Coloring With Blue
description: Blue's Room: Coloring With Blue aka Blue's Clues is a Plug It In & Play TV Kids controller based off the Nick Jr. TV series Blue's Room developed by ImagineEngine and made by Flying Colors (a.k.a Jakks Pacific) In 2004. The controller features four activities with 90 pages to color, complete and assemble.

name: Yume Gatari
description: Yume Gatari is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Netsuki, a boy that refuses to leave his room. Once in the dream world, the player can explore and collect effects. A mini game called SOUL can also by played by interacting with the console.

name: Capcom
description: The Capcom 3-in-1 joystick is a Plug It In & Play TV game system developed by HotGen and published by Jakks Pacific in 2005. It contains three classic Capcom games. The unit features a GameKey slot, although no GameKey was released for the unit.

name: Cars 2
description: Cars 2 is a Plug It In & Play Racing Video Game based on the Disney/Pixar movie released by Jakks Pacific in 2011. The steering wheel controller has a key on/off switch, drift buttons, and horn button.

name: Deal or No Deal
description: Sin descripción

name: Disney
description:
The Disney TV game is a Plug It In & Play TV Game developed by HotGen and published by Jakks Pacific in 2004.

A GameKey version was released a year later in 2005, in a Super GameKey Combo Pack with a GameKey. It was compatible with "DY" GameKeys.

name: Disney Friends
description:
Disney Friends (also known as Disney II) was a Plug It In & Play TV Game released by Jakks Pacific in 2005. It is the sequel to the original Disney TV game from 2004.

name: Dragon Ball Z

Plug & Play from Jakks Pacific released in 2005. There are 3 main modes available:

• Buto-Retsuden: Arcade Mode in which you have to compete in 1v1 matches. The sprites look similar to the SNES DBZ games
• Kamehameha Assault: Try to conquer all 7 Dragon Balls in a kind of "pong" clone
• Pinball: Search for secret triggers and collects as much points as possible: you'll unlock a boss fight and if you win, you'll get a Dragon Ball. Conquer all 7 and a wish of yours will come true

The game uses 8-bit graphics and has a very small amount of music.* Dinner for Dorothy: this game is very similar to most "catch the falling object" games. name: Thomas & Friends: Right on Time
description:
Right on Time is a TV Plug and Play video game released by Jakks Pacific and developed by HotGen in 2006.

Welcome to the Island of Sodor, it's nearly time for the party and Thomas has his work cut out for him gathering supplies and helping his friends. Capture runaway diesels, pick up cargo from Cranky the Crane, bring coal to stranded engines and clean up after those pesky coal trucks. Follow Sir Topham Hatt's directions while exploring the island to help Thomas become a useful engine.

The player can play as Thomas, Percy, James, Emily or Molly and help them do various jobs on Sir Topham Hatt's orders. The joystick is used to move the engine to where they need to be.

Along the way, useful tickets can be picked up and used to collect tokens for unlocking other engines. Other power-ups include speedups and freezing time.

name: MetaCity M
description: MetaCity M is a meta-universe mobile game with a global common server and a semi-sandbox open world. Each planet of MetaCity M has more than 1,600 small towns, 690 secondary cities, 55 primary cities and more than 510 million square meters. Kilometers of huge adventure world. description:
Fish are normally in a tank, not the easiest place to give one of the little guys a stroke.

So we took one out of the water just for you, don't worry we also gave it the ability to breath out of water. So take this rare opportunity to give it a stroke.

name: Fivies
description:
Fivies, the charming dice game with real physics.

The first game of Toth Games is a simple dice game in which you have to score as much points as possible. How? Just throw given combinations and write the points. The dices are randomly thrown and no prerecorded dice animations. Awesome!

Apart from English and German as main languages there is also SwissGerman! The language from the gamemaker and available in all upcoming Toth Games.

So start rolling the dices and get the highscore.

name: Stroke the Tortoise
description:
The tortoise is rather large and rather hard, but that is no reason not to give it a stroke.

They love being stroked as much as anything else, whether they can actually feel it is still up for debate. Don't let that stop you though!

description: "Pnevmo-Capsula" is a casual adventure game. You will travel to an alternate utopian atompunk world as a small trolley delivering mail. Time seems to have stopped at the break of 1930-1960 years here. The city is connected by a single system of rails.

You will explore the complex lair of the mighty Sun Usurper while defeating monsters, collecting treasures, avoiding traps, discovering secrets, and helping unlucky fellows you meet along the way!

name: Littlelands
description: The Littlelands region is brimming with strange characters and magical landscapes to discover if you know where to look, for a big-headed little youngster like you every moment exploring, growing berries, searching for buried treasures or walking through these lands can be an epic adventure.

name: Locomotorica: Staggering Ragdoll

name: Lofi Waifu Jigsaw
description: Lofi Waifu Jigsaw is puzzle game in which you have to combine pictures of sexy anime girls into one image using jigsaw pieces. Relaxing gameplay with beautiful artwork and original lofi music will help you calm down after a hard day at work or study.

name: Lone Wolf
description:
Lone Wolf: A Post Apocalyptic Beat-Em Up Role Playing Game. This action/adventure game lets a player use martial arts skills, weapons, and turn into a werewolf to fight their way through a world set in the aftermath of post nuclear devastation.

This game was made with the love of the beat-em up arcade machines and console games of the 1980's and 1990's, taking some of the mechanics of these games mixed with some more modern gameplay.

name: LonlyToy
description: Pass through various obstacles and descend to the next level when you have reached the signpost after crossing all obstacles and mechanisms.You can buy HP at the store. When you end the game due to a trigger mechanism in the middle of the game, you can continue the game from the position before the trigger mechanism by consuming HP instead of restarting.

name: Make Them Naked
description: Four precious girls are waiting for you! Flirt with them and play the rhythm game to Make Them Naked. Make a cup of tea and dive into the world of love! The game allows you to play with one hand thanks to an easy control.

name: Mark of the Void
description: Turn based RPG game with heavy reliance on strategy and item management. Inspiration from older rpg games with more punishing mechanics but more rewarding for patient and strategic players. Any type of player can play and enjoy, but the more dedicated and curious players will find more reward!

name: Dori Kanon
description: Sin descripción

name: Maskonauts: Chat'Attack

Shoot and loot the content of your favorite Twitch channels!
Get in your Maskopod and play in real time with Twitch chats activities! Survive waves of texts, Emoticodes and enemies.
Collect bonuses and try to defeat the Blockbossters and save the Maskotios!

Everything you type in the chat appears in the game!

description: Rule the MKW world as never before! From North Africa to Scandinavia, the Greater World is yours to conquer! This update doubles number of playable factions and greatly expands the world map. Completely compatible with MKW Royal Blood. So marshal your armies, my lord, The Greater World awaits.

Throw furniture, smash glass, raise a fuss or make employees dance - do anything you want, no one will fire you!

The boys don't know what they'll find there, anything is possible. Join them as they embark on a bunch of unexpected adventures!
